snippet.title: Little Cities | Snowy Islands DLC Trailer | Meta Quest VR
snippet.description:
The Snowy Islands DLC is out now for Little Cities on the Meta Quest Platform. Cozy up this winter season with the biggest update to Little Cities so far with more islands and lots of snowy shenanigans. 

Building on the picturesque, holiday feel that Little Cities has become known for, the Snowy Islands DLC features two new islands for you to create on, complete with a generous sprinkling of fresh Attractions, buildings, utilities, and the occasional avalanche! Get hands-on with the post-disaster clean-up by re-building demolished areas and clearing roads of snow.

Wrap up warm and build your mini-metropolis in a charmingly chilled setting with ice-capped mountains, ski resorts, ice palaces, and all the delights of the colder months sprinkled in. Find secret perfect pairings to max out your city’s Style Rating and keep the residents happy!
----
💙 Buy Now - https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4988470131168299
----
🏗️Developed by Purple Yonder
🧰Published by nDreams
----
👍 Subscribe - https://www.youtube.com/user/nDreamsVR?sub_confirmation=1
----
💻 Learn More - http://ndreams.com/games/little-cities
----
